verses.roman:
sabei praśaṁse nāṭaka 'parama uttama'
mahāprabhure śunāite sabāra haila mana

synonyms: sabei—all; praśaṁse—praised; nāṭaka—the drama; parama uttama—"very good, very good"; mahāprabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śunāite—to cause to hear; sabāra—of everyone; haila—there was; mana—mind.
translation: All the Vaiṣṇavas praised the drama, saying,"Very good, very good." They also desired for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to hear the drama.
